sub_title: HR Business Partner - ABU Tech @ Booking.com | CIPD
summary:
Experienced Senior Recruiter with a focus on Finance and IT roles. Experience in recruiting professionals from entry level to managerial positions, managing the recruitment process from requisition to on-boarding. 

Currently part of Booking’s Central Tech recruitment team, managing the recruitment processes for the new Bucharest office. Acting as a strategic business partner in aspects related to recruitment.

I have a CIPD certification in People Practice (level 3).

profile_positions.description:
• Providing advice, guidance and coaching to managers in all aspects of HR (for instance recruitment, L&D, compensation & benefits, internal policies and processes)
• Participate in the annual talent management cycle, attend and facilitate performance calibrations, promotion panels, talent review sessions and compensation evaluations
• Offer support on employee relation processes and cases including absenteism, illness and performance issues
• Work closely with other HR Advisory professionals and broader HR colleagues, to contribute to HR projects
• Ensure key processes are managed and executed well and timely
profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner - ABU Tech (Interim)

profile_positions.description: Member of the Career Life-Cycle committee, dealing with topics related to Performance management, Internal hiring policy etc.
profile_positions.title: Works Council Member

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for building the team for our new office in Bucharest, as well as recruiting Tech professionals for our main office in Amsterdam
• Manage the end-to-end hiring process for Central Technology teams (Security and Core Infrastructure)
• Recruiting professionals for specialist and managerial positions
• Be a trusted business partner and advisor on hiring strategies
• Gather market data for hiring managers to support and influence hiring decisions
profile_positions.title: Tech Recruiter - Central Technology

profile_positions.description:
▪ Act as a strategic business partner for Consulting and SaT divisions in recruitment related matters
▪ Recruiting professionals for all career levels, from entry level to managerial positions
▪ Managing the complete talent acquisition lifecycle from requisition to on-boarding for Software Development, Artificial Intelligence, Process Transformation, Cyber Security, Data & Analytics, Valuation, M&A and Transaction Diligence teams
▪ Design and execute recruitment strategies using a wide range of channels to source candidates
▪ Maintain a constant communication with hiring managers regarding pipeline and candidate status, trends and analysis of the employment market
▪ Act as internal consultant on all recruitment related issues and not only
▪ Work in close collaboration with other HR functions (compensation & benefits, HR administration, employer branding, HRBPs)
▪ Be involved in the annual Campus recruitment campaign (EY Express), participate as assessor in assessment centers and finale interviews
▪ Promoting EY as an employer of choice to all candidates through social media and branding activities
▪ SPOC for external recruitment partners
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruiter - Tech Consulting & SaT

profile_positions.description:
I’ve been part of Experis division, which is the global leader in attracting, assessing and placing specialized expertise in Finance & Accounting, Sales & Marketing, IT and Engineering, mainly for mid-level and managerial roles.

▪ Responsible of recruiting professionals for mid-level and managerial positions, with a focus on Finance and IT roles, but not only
▪ Recruited professionals for all type of companies, from small companies below 50 employees, to large corporations
▪ Responsible for sourcing, selection and assessment of candidates (direct search, CV screening, phone screening, face-to-face interviews)
▪ Develop talent attraction strategies depending on the project requirements
▪ Recruitment techniques: direct search via Linkedin, Bestjobs, eJobs and Hipo, Boolean search via Linkedin, posting job ads, sourcing candidates through Facebook groups
▪ Client management (maintain an active communication with my clients, attend meetings, building expertise in client’s business)
▪ Collaborating directly with the hiring manager on most of the projects, advice them to choose the right candidate
▪ Candidate management, building a strong network of candidates
▪ Occasionally performed outplacement actions for the best candidates in my database
▪ Participate in careers fairs
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
▪	Analyse the entire flow of the commercial and financial transactions performed by a company
▪	Prepare functional and economic analyses 
▪	Analyse the transaction flow, commercial terms, payment and invoicing flow
▪	Analyse the market conditions on which the client operates and the market price
▪	Provide professional advice to a specific portfolio of clients, highlight the risks and give them recommendations
▪	Review transfer pricing files prepared by junior colleagues
▪	Attend meetings with clients, be the main contact person for a certain number of clients, maintain active communication with clients and make sure deadlines are met
▪	Tracking the monthly budget in order to be achieved
▪	Seek new business opportunities
▪	Prepare price offers for potential clients
▪	Coordinate junior stuff and prepare technical trainings for them
profile_positions.title: Senior Tax Consultant - Transfer Pricing

profile_positions.description:
▪	Analyse the entire flow of the commercial and financial transactions performed by a company
▪	Prepare economic analyses based on the data provided by the client and the data extracted from various databases
▪	Prepare transfer pricing files
▪	I have prepared transfer pricing files for companies activating in various industries: IT, food & beverage manufacturing, agri-business, apparel & footwear manufacturing, waste management, insurance, leasing, banking etc.
▪	Review global/ regional transfer pricing documentation prepared by our colleagues from other jurisdictions and identify the main risks according to local transfer pricing regulations
▪	Advise clients in a range of different industries on transfer pricing matters
▪	Outline the technical issues, propose solutions/next steps to be followed
▪	Being the main contact person for a number of clients, develop and maintain active communication with clients and make sure deadlines are met
▪	Train and coordinate junior colleagues to prepare transfer pricing documentations and complex economic analyses
▪	Organize internal technical trainings for junior colleagues
▪	Assist managers and partners in business development efforts - drafting proposals and engagement letters, attend client meetings etc.
profile_positions.title: Senior Tax Consultant - Transfer Pricing

profile_positions.description:
▪	Provide tax advice to a large portfolio of clients operating in various industries on a broad range of local and international taxation matters
▪	Research and draft tax advice regarding direct taxation (corporate income tax, withholding tax, income tax and social contributions)
▪	Prepare transfer pricing files
▪	Prepare newsletters on tax legal amendments
▪	Organize and delegate tasks to junior tax consultants and being in charge to revise their work
▪	Assist managers and partners in business development efforts ‑ drafting proposals and contracts, attend client meetings etc.
profile_positions.title: Tax Consultant
